name: Ariadne's Escape
description:
You play Ariadne, the doomed princess of Crete. You are trapped in the Labyrinth, and must use your wits to escape. But is escape even possible?

Arrow keys to move.

There are three monsters. The Minotaur, the Wolf, and the Giant Boar. The Minotaur's and the Wolf's movement patterns are inspired by ghosts from Pacman, Blinky and Pinky, respectively. The Boar moves to the opposite side of the screen and back.

Enter the Maze by Kevin MacLeod is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 license. https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
